feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix Client Modal Component Ignore clicks outside Setting by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14125
  • Fix notification message from display the wrong phrasing by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14124
  • Always allow creating views by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14129
  • SCIM issue syncing existing sso users by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14130
  • CSV export fails for table with composite primary key by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14120

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.14...2.29.15

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix bug in oneOf search. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14128
  • Per-tenant enablement of SQS by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14116
  • Fixing issue with multiple relations to same table by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14131
  • Create a way to enable SQS for all tenants. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14135

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.15...2.29.16

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Automation UX fixes by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14111
  • Automation grouping by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14069
  • Fix for default CouchDB SQL URL by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14137

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.16...2.29.17

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Re-enable SQS (when flag set) in development/self host by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14141
  • When return all table rows is selected the is in filter returns nothing instead of all rows by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14140

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.17...2.29.18

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix a flake in the redis.spec.ts file. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14142
  • Fix fun flake in MySQL / MariaDB. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14143
  • Re-sync SQS definitions consistently by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14144
  • Fix a very rare flake in row.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14150
  • Return 401 instead of 403 by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14133

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.18...2.29.19
